page.title: 19SPORT IN KNUTSFORD
page.content: Knutsford has an impressive array of sporting amenities. Knutsford Leisure Centre is a large complex which offers a wide variety of sports. These include swimming pool, sports hall, contigym, 2 squash courts and a drama studio for rehearsal, table tennis, yoga, judo and keep fit. Mere Golf Club is a private establishment comprising an eighteen hole course and various social activities. Knutsford Sports Club has five hard tennis courts, two shale and two grass courts as well as two squash courts. Perhaps the most futuristic of the leisure amenities is a recently built private health club.The modern, Americanised interior has a sauna, sunbeds, jacuzzi, multigym, bar, rest area and well equipped changing rooms. It is popular and shows the inclinations of local residents.
